body: Led the development and design of the Immigrate.ai mobile app. We interns were tasked with creating a startup idea in the CSC Innovation labs. CSC being an immigration law firm, I understood the biggest pains in the process, and made a free to use app which does the $100+ hour standardized immigration consultation for free and through ML.

Created key reporting software for Canada's #1 Covid-19 RapidTest supplier. Built an end-to-end module allowing different departments to retrieve key reports and data which was previosuly a tedious manual process.
